Title: The Miracle of the Sun
Description: A crowd of over 70,000 witnessed the sun 'dance' in the sky in FÃ¡tima, 1917.

Title: The Eucharistic Miracle of Lanciano
Description: A consecrated Host visibly turned into flesh and blood during Mass.

Title: Healing at Lourdes
Description: Thousands have reported miraculous healings at the Marian shrine of Lourdes.

Title: The Miracle of Bolsena
Description: A consecrated Host began to bleed during Mass, leading to the Feast of Corpus Christi.

Title: Our Lady of Guadalupe
Description: The miraculous image of the Virgin Mary appeared on the tilma of St. Juan Diego.
